description: Enforce the principle of least privilege by limiting privileges of user accounts so only authorized accounts can modify the web directory.(Citation: NSA and ASD Detect and Prevent Web Shells 2020)

external_references.description: NSA and ASD. (2020, April 3). Detect and Prevent Web Shell Malware. Retrieved July 23, 2021.
external_references.source_name: NSA and ASD Detect and Prevent Web Shells 2020
